Hi,

I would like to know more about the "Sanada Family" and the ninja side.
Information on the 10 ninja brave, names etc...
Is there anyone who is teaching true Sanada Ryu in the UK or not?
I have investigated the claims by Adam Richardson saying that he teaches 
true Fuma Ryu and Sanada Ryu but I'm affraid he hasn't got a clue. All his 
techniques are made up and he cannot produce the evidence or even a name of 
who taught him, very strange. Maybe a case for the X files. Please help me 
find true Sanada Ryu...

Arigato,

ki-shin
